awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 6 wins & 3 nominations.

fullplot: Farinelli, is the artistic name of Carlo Broschi, a young singer in Handel's time. He was castrated in his childhood in order to preserve his voice. During his life he becomes to be a very famous opera singer, managed by his mediocre brother (Riccardo).
